title: How I Pvp (Video / 150 subs special kinda)

replies.body: Umm.... I don't want to sound rude but your not clicking at all in the video and I have faught many of jitter clickers and listened to them click and that just sounds like you added in clicking noise

replies.body: Some people like myself and Sho it seems have relatively quiet mice. Take the Razer Death Adder 2014 for example (mine). It makes barely no noise. Logitech Mice however are quite noisy. However, some Razer ones are noisy too. Just depends on what you have.
replies.body_tagged: Some people like myself and Sho it seems have relatively quiet mice. Take the Razer Death Adder 2014 for example (mine). It makes barely no noise. Logitech Mice however are quite noisy. However, some Razer ones are noisy too. Just depends on what you have.

replies.body: It's not mandatory to click loud when you pvp.
replies.body_tagged: It's not mandatory to click loud when you pvp.
